body:
^^^
I havent seen any rotations under games or on the server. Was walls removed? If so, why? It was just becoming popular again...

title: Walls = RIP?

replies.body: Temp removed, the Devs are working on making it better.
replies.body_tagged: Temp removed, the Devs are working on making it better.

replies.body:
^^ It's being added back. I've been asking around about it but every time I'm about a ask a dev a question they leave right before I can ask. lol

- If a dev/admin sees this, what is the new walls going to be? Will it be new kits and some map updates? Or will it just be updating stuff to Atlas?

I think it will.
Walls made this server, and Kylo did say that they were working on it while it's not on the server.

replies.body: I've heard from Sessp, Funky and ALM that it's coming back, they are just working on it. I just haven't had a chance to ask questions about it.

replies.body:
The walls is returning, they just need time to:

  1. Fix Atlas's Bugs
  2. Finish all the games in the Lobby
  3. Enhance the walls & Release it
  4. Then advertise
  5. And then its all sunshine & rainbows :)
